author: ericcano
body:
#### PR description:

This PR simply add `_soa_impl_`  to internal implementation variables of SoA templates to limit the risk of collisions with user names/

#### PR validation:

The SoA tests (and Pixel code which also depends one SoA) compiles and the SoA unit tests run. The main risk was a failure to compile.
title: Adds protection against name collision to SoA internal variables.
